alert.note: Alert for Greater Vancouver Area; Lower Columbia and I - 5 Corridor in Cowlitz County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued March 07 at 9:55AM PST until March 07 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST TODAY... * WHAT...Visibility one half mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...In Washington, Greater Vancouver Area and I-5 Corridor in Cowlitz County. In Oregon, Central Willamette Valley, Greater Portland Metro Area and Lower Columbia. * WHEN...Until noon PST today. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Fog will mainly impact locations west of I-5.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Greater Vancouver Area; Lower Columbia and I - 5 Corridor in Cowlitz County
